name: Greg
text: Hey, you there! You've got that 'fresh off the transport' look.

name: Greg
text: Listen up, new blood—Neon Nexus isn't kind to newcomers.

name: Greg
text: There's a reason you need to watch your back from the get-go.

name: Greg
text: You just landed in a hunter's playground.

name: Greg
text: The bounty game is real, and it's not just for kicks.

name: Greg
text: It's a mix of corporate espionage and gang initiation.

name: Greg
text: Newbies are the pawns, and everyone's looking to make a move.

name: Greg
text: I'll give you this piece of advice—trust is hard to earn but easy to lose.

name: Greg
text: Keep your eyes open and your tech close.

name: Greg
text: If you're still up for an adventure: at the end of the road is a gate that leads you deeper into a world full of dangers.

name: Greg
text: Before I forget: Someone has drilled out the road further ahead. Jump over it, provided you can manage it.

name: Greg
text: You jump with 'w'. But you probably already knew that. Why don't you try a double jump?

name: You
text: Thanks for the tip. Is there anything else?

name: Greg
text: Nah, you'll be fine. See ya! Ah, one more thing: if you get knocked out, the city spits you out again and you start all over again. So be careful what you do!

name: Greg
text: Oh, could you help me collect my datapads? I'll reward you generously! I scattered them all over the city on my pub crawl last night...

name: You
text: I see what I can do
